reviews.text:
Came to Fandi Mats for an 8it app Family Meal event so my experience is strictly from that event’s perspective. I was SO impressed by the space, the attentive staff and the energy of the space. Just as much credit goes to Steve and Mac the founders of the 8it app as it does to the restaurant for creating an amazing experience for those who work in the dining industry. They really took care of us last night.

Upon arrival, I was taken aback by the beauty of the space. It was all setup for the Dia de Los Muertos themed event, with candles and dancers in character floating around the space.

The event had a tequila tasting from Dobel, an Aperol bar, and the best margaritas. The winner of Top Chef Mexico, Carmen Miranda a generational tamalera who still prepares her handmade  tamales with extreme care in a labor of love one week process. This was a pop up that needs to be permanent. The staff made sure there wasn’t a single empty glass or plate on any table as we feasted the night away to a female DJ/percussionist duo. Definitely have to try it the place out on a non event night to get a true taste of it. Thanks team for taking care of the industry last night!
Great atmosphere, great labelling of items containing gluten (I am gluten free celiac). Alex was great
I loved the server Alex!!! He was so attentive and sweet. Also not bad to look at ;)
Alex was so sexy
Alex was a great server! This whole place is wonderful for brunch.
Alex was great super helpful, the staff was very kind. The food was delicious.
Ransomed stumbled on it. Food was delicious. DJ vibes were great. Service was excellent.

Great experience
Excellent service
Mario was the best
Mario was very friendly and ensured we all had a great time!
Service is amazing, request Mario!!

Great food, great atmosphere and great service. We had booked a table for 8 and actually ended up being 10. We were accommodated quickly and had the best server, Mario, attend to our group and our varied food preferences and restrictions.
Mario is the man. Awesome service and super friendly. He's the reason I'd come back
Mario is amazing!!!!!!
Alex was excellent, Great service and very attentive!
Food was great and our server Alex was amazing…good service and good atmosphere…highly recommended!!!
Alex was amazing
Alex was really good
Great food and great service, Igor was really sympatic!
Alex was amazing! He gave me great recommendations on the drink menu and came to check on our table multiple times. Overall my experience here is always a 10/10.
Alex gave us very good service and great drink suggestions. The food was very good as well with great ambience.

Great vibes, good music but not too loud you can’t hear eachother. Food was soo good! The croquetas are def worth it, the platter was soo good and fresh. We had the branzino it was nice and fresh, the steak was nice and juicy. The Brussels sprouts were delicious!!

Drinks are also really tasty, we had the Goodnight Adeline not so Smokey like mezcal, lighter and tasty. Also the Big in Japan was so good like a strawberry lemonade for adults.

Alex and Danilo were excellent servers - everything came so fast, great service and ambiance and food!
Super Mario
Mario super
Lamb shank was insane vibes were immaculate Mario = goat
Braised lamb shank was absolutely incredible. Mario was our waiter and he crushed it
Shout out Mario, they should add pickle backs to the menu.
Alex was a great server
Alex was an amazing server. Constantly checking in on us and helping us pick the best thing off the menu based on what we were feeling!
Good food, and our server, Mario, was fantastic.
Mario was our server and did a great job! Food was great as well as the atmosphere
Mario was amazing! Great service.
Mario was great and food was amazing.
Mario is great!!
Alex did a great job with serving us for the night. 10/10
Dajana was the best and deserves employee of the month!! Great vibe, food, and atmosphere
Danilo was amazing - best service in the city. We felt really welcomed!
Love dajana
Dayana is the best!!
LOVED DAJANA

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Had an amazing brunch at Fandi Mata! The space is absolutely beautiful with a gorgeous atmosphere that sets the perfect vibe. The food was excellent—flavorful, fresh, and beautifully presented. Our server, Dajana, was so attentive and sweet, making the whole experience even better. She went above and beyond with her great service. To top it off, we even got shots to celebrate our girls’ brunch! Such a fun and memorable experience. Can’t wait to come back!

After a day in Dumbo Brooklyn, best place to end day. Love each and every items we ordered as table of 8. Very beautiful ambiance. Our server Alex suggested to try Cauliflower dish as vegetarian and it was very satisfying. Kids loved spaghetti and pizza while rest of the dishes were cleaned by us. Would recommend coming for a date and just girls night as well.

Came here to celebrate my friend’s bachelorette and had an amazing experience! The place is atmospheric and beautiful, the staff were incredibly friendly, and the drinks were delicious. The food was outstanding, making the experience even more enjoyable. The floor manager kindly substituted my fries for a salad with my steak, even though substitutions aren’t usually offered. He even stopped by to open a bottle of champagne for us — such a thoughtful touch. Everything was so mindful and welcoming. I’ll definitely be coming back!

This restaurant has a stylish and cozy vibe with dim lighting. All around nice ambiance. The staff were friendly, attentive, and accommodating. I started with oysters, which were fresh and delicious. My steak came overcooked, but they quickly replaced it with perfectly cooked duck breast. Solid food, great service, and a nice atmosphere overall. Ideal spot for a date night or a relaxed dinner with a friend.

I’ve been wanting to check out Fandi Mata for a long time. I was greeted kindly and seated right away. I really liked the interior, lighting, mood, and overall ambiance—it definitely had a beautiful spirit.

I ordered the octopus salad as an appetizer, lamb chops as my main, and chocolate and pistachio ice cream for dessert.

The octopus salad was amazing—everything was fresh, and the salad was chopped really nicely, which made me enjoy the texture and balance even more. The octopus itself tasted great in the mix.

The lamb chops, however, were not traditionally cut. I asked for them medium-well, but they didn’t have the flavor I was hoping for. I finished the dish, but I wouldn’t order it again. That said, the zucchini relish that came on the plate was fantastic.

The ice cream was also good—I liked it.

One thing I have to mention is that it really bothers me to pay $6 for a flat fountain Diet Coke. Why not serve a canned soda instead? Wouldn’t you want to offer the best drink possible to your customers, whether it’s alcoholic or non-alcoholic? A bad drink lowers the overall dining experience.

Lastly, I think there’s some room for improvement in the service, particularly in terms of communication.

That said, I would consider going back there in the future.

First time here and will definitely be back! Brought my mom for Mother’s Day and we had the best time! Our server Dajana was amazing! Warm, welcoming and professional, couldn’t ask for a better experience. Honestly everyone was so nice from the minute we walked in to the moment we left. They greeted my mom with a rose which i thought was such a special touch! Everything we ate was super delicious, the espresso martinis(made with tequila instead of vodka) were amazing and the French toast was to die for!

Such a beautiful spot with stunning decor — I couldn’t stop admiring the space! The food, drinks, and dessert were all incredible. Every bite was flavorful, and I finished everything on my plate. The atmosphere felt like a little escape, with great attention to detail in both design and taste. Perfect place for a special night out or when you want to treat yourself to something memorable.

We had an amazing celebration all thanks to the staff here. We have a small baby and from the start with our late arrival the hosts were able to arrange a better time to seat us after calling ahead. The food was spectacular- we had the branzino and lamb chop mains and the tres leches for dessert. Huge thank you to the staff Danilo, Mário, Diana, & Oliver for taking care of us and insuring we had a very special day.

Recommended to reserve, especially when it’s good weather. My friend and I were lucky that we got a place to eat. Food was really good! The music was a good vibe without being obnoxiously too loud. The interior is gorgeous!

Cute place with lovely service! Their vegetarian pizza was very thin but good. I ordered thinking it was an individual serving sized pie, but it was pretty big. It was still finish-able because it was so light! Would recommend for a nice brunch spot with friends.

I had a fun experience here. Very spacious restaurant. Attentive staff. Warm and cozy food. The French toast was so good and so filling. The strawberry fields drink was sweet and not overly alcoholic. There was a live band playing. It was nice here. I’d return.

Food was amazing. My steak was cooked exactly as expected. The lamb chops were also to die for. The ambience was upbeat. Unfortunately, it was quite hard to communicate with our server. I tried communicating to her that I have epilepsy and need to ensure that there won’t be flashing lights but she was unable to understand me due to language barriers. Overall, I’d recommend this place but if you need accommodations, perhaps check in with the front host staff instead.

Easily one of the best restaurants in Brooklyn. Everything was impeccable—the food was delicious, our server was wonderful, the ambiance was spot on, and the live music added the perfect touch. An all-around incredible experience.

Beautiful atmosphere with a live DJ that gives the place a sexy, high-end vibe. We came dressed casually and still felt welcome. Our server, Dajana, was attentive, and her recommendations were top-notch.

This place is cool.  The bar is great, as is the happy hour (until 7!) and those prices are great.  The space is Big and they also do cute things like have a DJ and sell jewelry for hundreds of dollars, which is cool!

But you come to eat, drink, and socialize!  This place does pretty great when it's less busy.

A+ cocktails.  Perfect
Pricey, though.

First time in a long time I wish Google maps had an honorable mention feature.  Five stars don't do this place justice.  An ABSOLUTE gem.  Came here for an anniversary and was a great find in a superb neighborhood.
The food was stellar.  The croquetas are a must have.  I had the chicken Milanese sandwich and LOVED IT!  The gnocchi were absolutely delicious.  Will be coming back for sure
They had a band playing bossa nova and this band was on point.  The music was loud enough to enjoy, yet low enough so you didn't need to scream to be heard.
The ambiance is spectacular.

I’m not usually a review person but this place was incredible. My friend and I checked it out rather last minute and were amazed by how beautiful it is.
The most impressive part was the food though. There was clear thought and care behind every detail in every dish and even the couscous that came with the branzino had the most wonderful flavor.
Definitely coming back and recommending this place to people ✨

We had the potati rosti, French toast, and truffle egg boat. Absolutely delightful. Interior is absolutely beautiful and there was a lovely live performance. Love this place. Shout out to our wonderful servers DANIL AND DANILO

I’m impressed with this establishment, the cuisine and overall experience- please maintain this high standard. Additionally, our waitress Danilo demonstrated remarkable patience and a positive attitude when interacting with deaf patrons . We definitely will come back!

The DeFrancis

Great brunch. The Si Mamacita drinks are the best. Miss the gnocchi’s on the brunch menu but they’re a great dessert. Love the arugula salad, the halumi cheese and the truffle egg pizza. Great atmosphere with live music

This place is a 10/10 from the food, atmosphere/aesthetic, and service from our waitress Dajana! Such a sweetheart, very attentive and helped to recommend a dessert for us. I came for brunch with my girlfriends and I will definitely come back again!

Mediterranean inspired amid plant filled spacious warehouse deco. Outdoor vibes while being indoor.

Food and drinks is top notch just pace of service could be dialed back a bit otherwise 5 star. No need to ask if finished with drink, appetizer and entree every 3 minutes. Give your customers little time to chill and relax especially at 6pm and only 25% at capacity.

Our server Dajana was absolutely incredible! My friend and I ordered the lamb chops and shrimp ceviche and the food was phenomenal per usual. Cheers to Dajana for the impeccable service, she’s a star✨

We have a few drinks and the food pictured below!! Dajana was our waitress and she was amazing!! Everything came out pretty fast. My favorite was the ceviche, croquetas, and pizza, and fries so basically everything I ate. Definitely recommend!

Brunch was pretty good .
Recommendations : chicken skewers and the croquetas are absolutely delicious.
Avocado toast ( heavenly) I totally forgot the name of the drink but you'll see it in the photos.

Service was pretty good but hardly saw the server.  But the busboy took care of our table more efficiently than the server.

But the most important thing is the food since that's what you really pay for. So that is a 10 out of 10.

Will I go back ? Absolutely yes for the croquetas and the avocado toast .

The pistachio gelato recommended but please skip the tiramisu.

Went for dinner with a friend. We made a reservation and there was no wait for our table to be ready.

We had arrived early and grabbed a drink at the bar first. I found the happy hour options to be very limited considering how extensive their drinks menu is (it's longer than the food menu). It also took some time for the bartender to acknowledge me, get me a menu, and take my drink order. He didn't really speak to me, didnt offer a menu when I sat down, and I wasnt even sure he heard my order because he didnt say anythjng before walking away. The bar wasn't busy at the time so I wasn't sure what was happening. When we were ready for our table, he did say he would transfer our drinks and food to our table so we didnt have to check out at the bar so that was very helpful. The sparkling wine and hummus were very good.

We did have to move our initial table because we were closer to the kitchen and for some reason, we would get hit with a very strong, not so great smell. The hostess was very pleasant and moved us up to the front and we were grateful, not only due to the issue with the previous table but also because the staff in this section were way more attentive and friendly than the ones in the previous section. It really improved the experience. As the night went on, the restaurant did fill up and they had a dj playing music. The vibes were great, the space looked as wonderful at night as it does during the day.

The food and drinks were amazing. There wasn't a single thing I was disappointed with. My friend said that the smoked beets were just ok. I didn't try them but I did try the cabbage on that plate and that was good; she agreed. The lamb chops were absolutely delicious. The flavors, the presentation, the portion....all excellent. My French fries were crisp and delicious. The Brussel sprouts were good as well, wouldn't be my first choice for a side next time but still good.

I was so happy to see that they had mocktail options since I was driving. I got the Eye of the Tiger. This was my favorite thing of the night (sorry lamb chops). It was so refreshing and flavorful; as complex and well thought out any alcoholic cocktail. I really appreciated that. I could have drank 10 of them. And speaking of drinks...this is small and weird but I really liked it...they offered us sparkling or still water and I opted for sparkling....not sure why but I've never drank so much water in a restaurant before. It was sooo refreshing for some reason.

Bathroom was clean and adequate. With the style of the doors, it is hard to tell which ones are occupied.

The dessert options were great. I liked both the pudding and the Tart.

Gratuity was automatically included in the check.

Would like to come back to try their brunch menu.

They had a jazz band playing when we walked in at 3pm on a Saturday and were seated right away. We tried all 3 mocktails on the menu - amazing. We ordered a corn dish and shrimp ceviche for appetizers; steak and eggs, and potato Rosti for mains. The texture for potato Rosti was so good. It was crispy on the outside and light, fluffy and creamy in the middle. It’s a must try.

I loved Fandi Mata. First of all, such a lovely location.  The building is beautiful outside but inside such a refreshing atmosphere with soaring ceilings and second story seating overlooking the main floor.  Filled with beautiful trees and other plants, the ambiance restaurant meets covered Mediterranean patio with intimate books of bookshelf's and curios with comfortable chairs and good sized tables.
The food, such a selection and the drinks well in addition to crafted cocktails, the wines were fabulous.  I partook of a spicy non alcoholic cocktail which was simultaneously fruity and spicy a.k.a. Eye of the Tiger. Unique taste for me.
We all loved our meals (we had Cauliflower al pastor, branzino, and hanger steak-yum) and rounded out our lovely dinner with a truly heavenly dessert, tres leches cake and coconut panacotta.  Wow.
A must visit eatery in Brooklyn

Wow!! This restaurant is perfect for a romantic date night. The service was great, especially considering how busy it was as it was a Friday night. We got the Brussels sprouts to share, the lamb chops, the steak, a few drinks and the tiramisu. The lamb chops were absolutely incredible 10/10. If you are thinking about ordering  keep in mind you can only order them medium rare. My date thought the steak was delicious and well seasoned, however it was just slightly more cooked than she asked for. The Brussels sprouts I could have honestly went without, but I enjoyed everything else! If you are thinking of ordering a drink - the strawberry fields is amazing - the perfect balance of sweet and tart.

I found this place via Instagram and was skeptical, but I’m so glad I went! The smoked beets were so unique and filling, my cocktail (the “big in Japan”) was delicious, and the vibe was so fun and eclectic (gorgeous plants everywhere!). Our server was Mario and he made great suggestions, paid great attention without being overbearing, and was overall super friendly. Will def be back!

My friend and I chose to host our networking event at Fandi Mata because we loved the ambiance. We had a nice, semi-private area for our group of about 40 people, still connected to the main restaurant hall. The manager, Dražen, was wonderful and very accommodating to all our event needs. We truly felt great here! The cocktails and food were both top quality — highly recommend!

This is my new favorite spot. Our server Dajana was amazing. She kept checking on us and gave us great menu suggestions. She’s the best. Also the steak and eggs was so good. The steak was perfectly seasoned. And the drinks were really good too.

We were pleasantly surprised with this place. Starting with the interior, it feels like you are in a botanical garden. The food was good, the cocktails were awesome, it was a little bit too loud but we didn’t not mind. The service was perfect. We will be coming back here again.

Brunch music was a bonus.  A no wait reserved table and a really nicely done roomy space.  We enjoyed our meals very much.  One of the best cheeseburgers I have enjoyed in a really long time.  Reasonable prices and the drinks were fun.  Great place to celebrate my wife's birthday.
Place was amazing for brunch. Went with my cousin and we enjoyed the food and atmosphere. Dajana was our server and she did a great job of recommending dishes and providing a great service!
Went for my friends birthday brunch . Food was delish drinks were yummy . The cappuccino was mind blowing and the place is lively and gives you tropical vibes and wait the tres leches omggggg yummy
Went here for brunch and loved every single plate! The food was delicious. The venue is beautiful covered with exotic plants everywhere, and the live music created an ideal atmosphere.

I don’t know where to start! The restaurant is absolutely beautiful and calming! The food is great .. I was so full I had to take some food home. My server, Dajana, was super attentive and kind. I’ll be back for sure! ☺️

Here’s a polished review you could post online for Fandi Mata:

⸻

We couldn’t have imagined a better place to celebrate my sister’s wedding than Fandi Mata. From start to finish, the team went above and beyond to make the day absolutely perfect.

The space itself is stunning—warm, vibrant, and unique, with such a beautiful atmosphere for both the ceremony and the reception. We held everything here—ceremony, light apps, dinner, and dancing—and every single part was seamless.

The food was exceptional. From the appetizers to the main dinner, every dish was beautifully presented and full of flavor. Our guests are still raving about how delicious everything was! The drinks were just as impressive—creative, balanced, and served with style.

What truly set the night apart, though, was the staff. They were attentive, professional, and so genuinely kind. Every detail was handled with care, and they made us feel so taken care of throughout the evening. Planning a wedding can be stressful, but Fandi Mata’s team made the entire process feel effortless.

We are so grateful to Fandi Mata for creating the most magical setting for such a special day. If you’re looking for an unforgettable event space with incredible food, drinks, and service, look no further—you’ve found it here.

Jelena was fabulous!!!!! Super attentive. Great customer service. The voyageur passione drink is fabulous. The decor is beautiful. The food is alright! I got the steak and eggs. Great for big parties- we had 9 people at our table!
